means.word_mean: 1. British admiral; was captain of the H.M.S. Bounty in 1789 when part of the crew mutinied and set him afloat in an open boat; a few weeks later he arrived safely in Timor 4,000 miles away (1754-1817)

auth_sentence.content: "It's such a big storm it's a monster, killer storm," Mrs Bligh said.
